kariminf.as.process.extraction.bayes

Class TFB

  • java.lang.Object
    • kariminf.as.process.extraction.bayes.TFB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feature

    public class TFB
extends java.lang.Object
implements Feature
    TFB: term frequency (Bigrams). This feature is used to score a sentence using the frequencies of consecutive pair of terms in a text.

      • score

        public java.lang.Double score(int classID,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.Object> scoreParam)
        Description copied from interface: Feature
        Scores a sentence according to a topic. The sentence is scored using the score parameters, for example, the term frequency.
        Specified by:
        score in interface Feature
        Parameters:
        classID - the ID of the class (topic) wich is used to score the sentence
        scoreParam - a list of Objects which are the parameters needed to score the sentence
        Returns:
        the score of the sentence in the class "classID" using this feature
